title: Get files inside a Power BI report | Unzip a Power BI file
excerpt: In this video I will show you how to recover your power bi pictures or json theme files from within Power BI. This trick does not work for old power bi files!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI!
